name: sparkybudget
description: SparkyBudget is a self-hosted personal budgeting tool for tracking income, expenses, and categories. It provides charts and summaries so users can manage finances simply.
features: Income tracking: Records income sources and amounts.
Expense logging: Tracks spending by category and date.
Budget categories: Organizes finances into customizable categories.
Monthly summaries: Displays income vs expenses for each month.
Spending charts: Visualizes spending patterns with graphs and charts.
Recurring transactions: Sets up automatic entries for regular income or bills.
Balance tracking: Monitors account balances over time.
Goal setting: Creates savings goals and tracks progress.
Export data: Downloads financial data as CSV for analysis.
Multi-currency: Supports budgeting in different currencies.
Mobile responsive: Manages budget from smartphones and tablets.
Privacy focused: Stores all data locally without external services.
